enam 2011 wasare laba gath wides gaman balapatha්raya nathi wu bawata 2012 wasare di ewakata wimal amathithuma aagamana ha wigamana departhamenthuwata danum di athi athara ee wenuwen nawa balapatha්rayak ema wasaredima labagena atha.

man giyama loku maththaya usawiye nadukaraya ahuwa warada piligannawada kiyala.
sigarat pakat matha rupamaya awawada pradarshanaya kirima 60% kin wiya yuthu bawa adhikarana thinduwayi.
maithri shrilanipa sabhapathi wu pasu rajapakshawarunta ha owun samaga sitina ayatada nithiya kriyathma wana bawak penenne natha.
dakune adhyapana kalapa 11 ma wasara gananawak sa.pe. prathiela anuwa jathika samanya agayata wada ihalin sitiyeya.

linda soya ganimata, gaman karanna kambal para, wimbaldan wilej, sudu pahathi badhaka sahitha gettuwak haraha dakunu debalaka gaman karayi.

mulu dawasa purama pawathi wadamuluwaka swarupaya gath mema sakachchawedi ee wanawita owunta labi thibu sankhya lekhana, wiwidha wartha ha thorathuru siyalla katikota samalochanaya kirima sidu wu athara udasana aaharaya, diwa aaharaya menma siyaluma awashyatha ema sakachcha kamaraya thulatama sapayuni.
yamkisi ratak, lokaye anik ratawal samaga kriyakarana aakaraya anuwa thamayi, ee ratata sathuru ratawal athiwenne.

artha : me widhi kriaya wishayayehi nu prabathyaeyaya abhimatha yi. 27 418 sidath sangara wiwaranaya wisthara : widhanakhya thayehi ‘nu’ pra thya yaya no yede; yedenuye karthru, karma, bhawa yana nama kriwaya wishayayehi ya.
